alert.note: Alert for Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 3:54AM MST until January 14 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM MST SUNDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 4 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches, except 6 to 16 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Albion, Almo, Malta, Rockland, Holbrook, Inkom, McCammon, Downey, Lava Hot Springs, Malad, Preston, and Thatcher. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
